name: Mandelbrot Explorer (6849543oaw)
description:
Explore the many patterns in the Mandelbrot Fractal Controls
  • W, A, S, D to move
  • E to rotate clockwise
  • Q to rotate counter-clockwise
  • "+" to zoom in
  • "-" to zoom out
  • C to access the controls
  • Alt + Enter to toggle on/off fullscreen

Credits

I didn't create this, I only modified it. All credit goes to The Art of Code.

Here are his tutorials I used:

His Channel: The Art of Code - YouTube Channel

Installation
  1. Download the .zip file
  2. Right click the downloaded file
  3. Click "Extract All..."
